tool_description: Evaluates how well resume content aligns with job-specific keywords and provides relevance scores for optimization guidance.

target_keywords.description: List of keywords from job description

scoring_method.description: Scoring approach: exact_match, semantic_similarity, or hybrid

error_messages: Empty resume content: Provide resume text with substantive content for analysis.
No keywords provided: Include at least one target keyword for comparison.
Invalid scoring method: Use one of [exact_match, semantic_similarity, hybrid].
Keyword list too long: Provide no more than 50 keywords for effective analysis.
usage: Input resume content and target keywords from job analysis, optionally specify scoring method. The tool returns relevance scores and match analysis.

missing_keywords.description: Important keywords not found in resume

match_strength.description: Overall match strength: weak, moderate, strong, excellent
